Hire the historic Gloucester Guildhall for your event, performance, or ceremony.

About the Guildhall

Gloucester Guildhall is a historic building in the heart of the city. It has performance and event spaces suitable for a range of activities.

Suitable for

Performances

Concerts, shows, and theatre

Conferences

Business events and meetings

Weddings

Ceremonies and receptions

Exhibitions

Art and displays

Ceremonies

Civic and formal events

Meetings

Large group gatherings

How to book

  1. Contact the Guildhall booking team to check availability
  2. Complete booking form with your event details
  3. Provide insurance and risk assessment for your activities
  4. Get licensing if needed for alcohol or entertainment
  5. Pay hire fees before your event

What you need

Similar to other events on council property, you will need:

  • Insurance (public liability cover)
  • Risk assessment for your event activities
  • Licensing if selling alcohol or having entertainment (Temporary Event Notice or premises licence)
  • Compliance with capacity limits

Get in touch

For availability, pricing, and bookings, contact the Guildhall booking team or the City Events team.
